#Simulate data set
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
set.seed(123)
Table_1<- 
  tibble(person= c(1:1055),
         Factor= sample(x= c(1,2,3),
                        size = 1055,
                        replace = TRUE,
                        prob = c(0.612, 0.224,0.164)),
         Gender= sample(x=c(1,2),
                        size= 1055,
                        prob = c(0.2,0.8),
                        replace = TRUE),
         Age_Group= sample(x=c(1,2,3),
                           size=1055,
                           prob=c(0.65,0.55,0.05),
                           replace= TRUE))

Table_1<- Table_1%>%
  filter(Age_Group %in% c(1,2))

Table_2<- Table_1%>%
  count(Factor)%>%
  mutate(percentage= n/sum(n))
#Plot 
p_1<- 
  ggplot(data = Table_1)+
  geom_bar(aes(x= factor(Factor),fill=factor(Age_Group)))+
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(y= "人数",
       title = "选择线下零售护肤店时更关注哪些因素")+
  scale_x_discrete(labels= c(
    "线下零售体验","柜姐服务及专业度","口碑及知名度"
  ))+
  labs(fill= "年龄段")+
  scale_fill_discrete(labels=c("16~22","22~30"))+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())


p_1


write.csv(Table_1, here::here("Simulation.csv"))
```
